title: 93/57/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 December 1992 approving the programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by the United Kingdom for Jersey (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 December 1992 approving the programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by the United Kingdom for Jersey (Only the English text is authentic)
(93/57/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis for Jersey, submitted by the United Kingdom, is hereby approved.
The United Kingdom shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with the programme referred to in Article 1 by 1 January 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1992.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 46, 19. 2. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 68, 15. 3. 1973, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 107, 24. 4. 1986, p. 1.
